e2eId.description: Correlational event unique identifier for logging and instrumentation

organisation.description: Data Type for Identifier of an OrganisationCode.

source.description: Module identifier that publishes the message

partitionKey.description: kafka partition key where the message is sent in the specific topic. The message id is used

messageVersion.description: message versioning, it is incremented at each message update

messageType.description: type of the message. Indicates whether related with vehicle journey or not

operation.description: type of operation performed by the user on the message

creationDateTime.description: datetime, in UTC ISO8601, creation date time

startValidity.description: datetime, in UTC ISO8601, start validity

endValidity.description: datetime, in UTC ISO8601, end validity

items.description: a Scheduled message optionally can be related to a situation (SIRI)
channel on which the message is delivered. EXTERNAL is not used for MonitoredJourneyScheduledMessage

id.description: **This refers to code external to Moova**. It is retrieved by invoking the SVCPLN-NetworkCode service

items.description: point where to deliver the scheduled message

language.description: identifies the language of the audio content

text.description: audio text used for tts system

items.description: information about audio text. This part is present if the audio content type is AUDIO_TEXT

media.description: used only for audio file, in this case audio content type is AUDIO_FILE

repetitions.description: number of times the audio message must be repeated each occurens. It is only used for REPEAT_EVERY type scheduling

repeatEvery.description: period of time that must pass between an audio repetition and the next. This field is in seconds. It is only used for REPEAT_EVERY type scheduling

startDateTime.description: scheduling start date. It is only used for REPEAT_EVERY type scheduling

endDateTime.description: scheduling end date. It is only used for REPEAT_EVERY type scheduling

startTime.description: scheduling start time. It is only used for REPEAT_EVERY type scheduling

endTime.description: scheduling end time. It is only used for REPEAT_EVERY type scheduling

daysOfWeek.description: days of the week when the rule is valid. If the list is empty it is valid every day. It is only used for REPEAT_EVERY type scheduling

deliveryAtDateTime.description: message delivery date and time. It is only used for DELIVERY_AT type scheduling

scheduledAudioDeliveryRules.description:
The delivery rules can be of three types: 
  - NOW the message must be delivered at the time of insertion. 
  - DELIVERY_AT the message must be delivered on the date-time _deliveryAtDateTime_. 
  - REPEAT_EVERY the message begins to be delivered from _startDateTime_ at _startTime_ to _endDateTime_ at _endTime_ evaluating the repetition conditions and _daysOfWeek_ conditions.

recipientAudioMessagesToDeliver.description: audio message to deliver. This part is present if the content type is AUDIO or AUDIO_VIDEO type for a ScheduledMessage

language.description: identifies the language of the video content

startTime.description: scheduling start time. Could be null for CONTINUOS_DELIVERY type scheduling

endTime.description: scheduling end time. Could be null for CONTINUOS_DELIVERY type scheduling

daysOfWeek.description: days of the week when the rule is valid. If the list is empty it is valid every day. It is only used for WHEN type scheduling

deliveryRules.description:
The delivery rules can be of two types: 
  - WHEN the message must be delivered to the video from the _startDateTime_ date to the _endDateTime_ date only in the time interval between the _startTime_ time and _endTime_ time for each day in the _daysOfWeek_ list
  - CONTINUOUS_VISUALIZATION the message must be delivered to the video from the _startDateTime_ date (at _startTime_ if exists) to the _endDateTime_ (at _endTime_ if exists)

recipientVideoMessagesToDeliver.description: video message to deliver. This part is present if the content type is VIDEO or AUDIO_VIDEO type for a ScheduledMessage

onGroundRecipient.description: scheduled message to delivery at specified _deliveryPoints_. This part is present if the scheduled message must be delivered on channel ONGROUND

dataFrameRef.description: unique identifier of data frame within participant service

language.description: identifies the language of the audio content

text.description: audio text used for tts system

items.description: information about audio text. This part is present if the audio content type is AUDIO_TEXT

media.description: used only for audio file, in this case audio content type is AUDIO_FILE

repetitions.description: number of times the audio message must be repeated each occurens. It is only used for REPEAT_EVERY type scheduling

repeatEvery.description: period of time that must pass between an audio repetition and the next. This field is in seconds. It is only used for REPEAT_EVERY type scheduling

startDateTime.description: scheduling start date. It is only used for REPEAT_EVERY type scheduling

endDateTime.description: scheduling end date. It is only used for REPEAT_EVERY type scheduling

startTime.description: scheduling start time. It is only used for REPEAT_EVERY type scheduling

endTime.description: scheduling end time. It is only used for REPEAT_EVERY type scheduling

daysOfWeek.description: days of the week when the rule is valid. If the list is empty it is valid every day. It is only used for REPEAT_EVERY type scheduling

deliveryAtDateTime.description: message delivery date and time. It is only used for DELIVERY_AT type scheduling

scheduledAudioDeliveryRules.description:
The delivery rules can be of three types: 
  - NOW the message must be delivered at the time of insertion. 
  - DELIVERY_AT the message must be delivered on the date-time _deliveryAtDateTime_. 
  - REPEAT_EVERY the message begins to be delivered from _startDateTime_ at _startTime_ to _endDateTime_ at _endTime_ evaluating the repetition conditions and _daysOfWeek_ conditions.

recipientAudioMessagesToDeliver.description: audio message to deliver. This part is present if the content type is AUDIO or AUDIO_VIDEO type for a ScheduledMessage

language.description: identifies the language of the video content

startTime.description: scheduling start time. Could be null for CONTINUOS_DELIVERY type scheduling

endTime.description: scheduling end time. Could be null for CONTINUOS_DELIVERY type scheduling

daysOfWeek.description: days of the week when the rule is valid. If the list is empty it is valid every day. It is only used for WHEN type scheduling

deliveryRules.description:
The delivery rules can be of two types: 
  - WHEN the message must be delivered to the video from the _startDateTime_ date to the _endDateTime_ date only in the time interval between the _startTime_ time and _endTime_ time for each day in the _daysOfWeek_ list
  - CONTINUOUS_VISUALIZATION the message must be delivered to the video from the _startDateTime_ date (at _startTime_ if exists) to the _endDateTime_ (at _endTime_ if exists)

recipientVideoMessagesToDeliver.description: video message to deliver. This part is present if the content type is VIDEO or AUDIO_VIDEO type for a ScheduledMessage

onBoardRecipient.description: scheduled message to delivery at specified _vehicleJourneys_. This part is present if the scheduled message must be delivered on channel ONBOARD

language.description: identifies the language of the external content

id.description: **This refers to code external to Moova**. It is retrieved by invoking the SVCPLN-NetworkCode service

items.description: point where to deliver the scheduled message

externalSystemRecipient.description: scheduled message to delivery to external system. It can delivered to _externalPoints_. This part is present if the scheduled message must be delivered on channel EXTERNAL

scheduledMessage.description: it is filled only if the message is of type SCHEDULED_MESSAGE. The scheduled message can be delivered through one or more channels: ONGROUND, ONBOARD or EXTERNAL

dataFrameRef.description: unique identifier of data frame within participant service

id.description: **This refers to code external to Moova**. It is retrieved by invoking the SVCPLN-NetworkCode service

items.description: point where to deliver the scheduled message

language.description: identifies the language of the content

audioText.description: audio text used for tts system

items.description: audio message content to be delivered for monitored journey scheduled message

eventType.description: one of the event for messages to deliver on board ARRIVING DEPARTING ARRIVED DEPARTED

deliveryRules.description: Delivery Rule for monitored journey scheduled message

deliveryType.description: delivery type of message associated with vehicle journeys

audioMessageContents.description:
audio message content to be delivered for monitored journey scheduled message with delivery rules.
Audio messages can be delivered in three delivery types specified in the _deliveryType_ field: 
- ON_EVENT the message is delivered for vehicle journey when that vehicle journey generates a specified event for a defined Point in _deliveryPoints_ (e.g. ARRIVING)
- ON_SCHEDULE the message is delivered on a specific vehicle journey scheduling date happens for a defined Point in _deliveryPoints_ (e.g. estimated arrival time)

videoTexts.description: list of video message for vehicle journey

language.description: identifies the language of the content

videoText.description: audio text used for tts system

items.description: video message content to be delivered for monitored journey scheduled message

monitoredJourneyScheduledMessage.description: is filled only if the message is of type MONITORED_JOURNEY_SCHEDULED_MESSAGE

payload.description: Object containing the information of a scheduled message inserted by an operator

language.description: identifies the language of the audio content

text.description: audio text used for tts system

AudioText.description: information about audio text. This part is present if the audio content type is AUDIO_TEXT

Audio messages can be delivered in three delivery types specified in the _deliveryType_ field: 
- ON_EVENT the message is delivered for vehicle journey when that vehicle journey generates a specified event for a defined Point in _deliveryPoints_ (e.g. ARRIVING)
- ON_SCHEDULE the message is delivered on a specific vehicle journey scheduling date happens for a defined Point in _deliveryPoints_ (e.g. estimated arrival time)

recipientAudioMessagesToDeliver.description: audio message to deliver. This part is present if the content type is AUDIO or AUDIO_VIDEO type for a ScheduledMessage

language.description: identifies the language of the video content

startTime.description: scheduling start time. Could be null for CONTINUOS_DELIVERY type scheduling

endTime.description: scheduling end time. Could be null for CONTINUOS_DELIVERY type scheduling

daysOfWeek.description: days of the week when the rule is valid. If the list is empty it is valid every day. It is only used for WHEN type scheduling

deliveryRules.description:
The delivery rules can be of two types: 
  - WHEN the message must be delivered to the video from the _startDateTime_ date to the _endDateTime_ date only in the time interval between the _startTime_ time and _endTime_ time for each day in the _daysOfWeek_ list
  - CONTINUOUS_VISUALIZATION the message must be delivered to the video from the _startDateTime_ date (at _startTime_ if exists) to the _endDateTime_ (at _endTime_ if exists)

recipientVideoMessagesToDeliver.description: video message to deliver. This part is present if the content type is VIDEO or AUDIO_VIDEO type for a ScheduledMessage

onGroundRecipient.description: scheduled message to delivery at specified _deliveryPoints_. This part is present if the scheduled message must be delivered on channel ONGROUND

  - REPEAT_EVERY the message begins to be delivered from _startDateTime_ at _startTime_ to _endDateTime_ at _endTime_ evaluating the repetition conditions and _daysOfWeek_ conditions.

onBoardRecipient.description: scheduled message to delivery at specified _vehicleJourneys_. This part is present if the scheduled message must be delivered on channel ONBOARD

language.description: identifies the language of the external content

id.description: **This refers to code external to Moova**. It is retrieved by invoking the SVCPLN-NetworkCode service

items.description: point where to deliver the scheduled message

externalSystemRecipient.description: scheduled message to delivery to external system. It can delivered to _externalPoints_. This part is present if the scheduled message must be delivered on channel EXTERNAL

scheduledMessage.description: it is filled only if the message is of type SCHEDULED_MESSAGE. The scheduled message can be delivered through one or more channels: ONGROUND, ONBOARD or EXTERNAL

dataFrameRef.description: unique identifier of data frame within participant service

id.description: **This refers to code external to Moova**. It is retrieved by invoking the SVCPLN-NetworkCode service

items.description: point where to deliver the scheduled message

language.description: identifies the language of the content

audioText.description: audio text used for tts system

items.description: audio message content to be delivered for monitored journey scheduled message

eventType.description: one of the event for messages to deliver on board ARRIVING DEPARTING ARRIVED DEPARTED

deliveryRules.description: Delivery Rule for monitored journey scheduled message

deliveryType.description: delivery type of message associated with vehicle journeys

audioMessageContents.description:
audio message content to be delivered for monitored journey scheduled message with delivery rules.
Audio messages can be delivered in three delivery types specified in the _deliveryType_ field: 
- ON_EVENT the message is delivered for vehicle journey when that vehicle journey generates a specified event for a defined Point in _deliveryPoints_ (e.g. ARRIVING)
- ON_SCHEDULE the message is delivered on a specific vehicle journey scheduling date happens for a defined Point in _deliveryPoints_ (e.g. estimated arrival time)

videoTexts.description: list of video message for vehicle journey

language.description: identifies the language of the content

videoText.description: audio text used for tts system

items.description: video message content to be delivered for monitored journey scheduled message

monitoredJourneyScheduledMessage.description: is filled only if the message is of type MONITORED_JOURNEY_SCHEDULED_MESSAGE
